title: 3 writers on this board currently... suspicious...
body: Does this mean some of the piltover content should be unlocking soon? ;)

replies.body: A Piltover page wouldnt just pop-out if they didnt plan to release the stories related to it soon after it popped-out.
Obviously, I was thinking like sometime in the next hour not just in the next few days. At the time I posted it, Jaredan Waarghbobo and Leaoc had all just posted, which is pretty rare

I'm just skulking, looking shifty. No particular timing.


/moonwalks into the shadows

What was your PhD again?
Teasing?
He damn well founded the school of professional teasing. Jaredan's a monster!

Well its nice to see you around again! 

....now wheres that map D:

> [{quoted}](name=Monado II,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mEuQbiFa,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-01T22:09:40.261+0000)
>
> Obviously, I was thinking like sometime in the next hour not just in the next few days. At the time I posted it, Jaredan Waarghbobo and Leaoc had all just posted, which is pretty rare

And also they have responded to the Gloriously Evolved misinformation bit quite quickly. Indeed this is quite preferable to see from the Lore team. I have no doubt massive lore dump is on its way (with planned Champion Full Relaunches in between).
Hey I can handle a bit of icky.
Err well I think most of us are predicting Warwick's relaunch soon. no one else anytime soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Monado II,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mEuQbiFa,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-01T22:17:47.256+0000)
>
> Err well I think most of us are predicting Warwick's relaunch soon. no one else anytime soon.

It will be during Zauns lore update, which is most likely next patch cycle from now. After Camille is released and the main lore page for Piltover is updated.

Then ether two or three patch cycles from now, its Galio.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mEuQbiFa,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2016-12-01T22:26:03.202+0000)
>
> Massive lore dump sounds icky.

Beautifully icky.
Nah, everybody is sick and at home.

You should watch your back.
I know a certain individual who's drawn to illness.
Sickness sustains him after all.

*bashes Malicious on the nose*

Oi! If you bring out the sickness no one will be around to release the Piltover lore!

BACK! BAAAAACK!!!!!
Aww hope you feel better soon ~~so you can unlock that ezreal and cait lore~~
